product_name: FARMACYBrighten Up 3% TXA Dark Spot Toner
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackFarmacy's brightening Brighten Up 3% TXA Dark Spot Toner is clinically proven to reduce the look of dark spots in just 7 days. It gently resurfaces and evens skin with azelaic acid and 5% PHA, and is suitable for all skin types and tones.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated with a triple-threat dark spot solution thatâ€™s clinically proven to reduce the look of dark spots in just seven daysKey Ingredients3% TXA (Tranexamic Acid): visibly brightens and reduces the look of dark spots5% PHA (Gluconolactone) and Azelaic Acid: visibly evens tone, smooths texture, and gently exfoliatesUpcycled Tangerine Peel: a hydrating nature-derived antioxidantResearch ResultsClinical Results: Based on clinical and consumer panel testing on 36 subjects after 7 days:Clinically proven to visibly reduce dark spots97% agreed skin clarity was improvedBased on clinical and consumer panel testing on 34 subjects after 8 weeks:100% showed visible reduction in dark spots100% showed improvement in skin tone evenness97% showed visible reduction in the look of hyperpigmentationItem 2641202How To Use-Swipe onto a clean face, morning and/or evening, avoiding your eye area.-Do not rinse.-Follow with serum or moisturizer-For daytime use, follow with sunscreen.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Gluconolactone, Pentylene Glycol, Isopentyldiol, Tranexamic Acid, Betaine, Propanediol, Azelaic Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Sinensis Peel Extract, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Allantoin, Polyglycerin-6, Inulin, Fructose, Glucose, Xanthan Gum, Cellulose Gum, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Cellulose.The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: My HG for dark spots
reviews.comments: I don't typically believe in a "holy grail" product,   but this is it! It's fungal acne safe, has two of the most effective treatments for dark spots and melasma, and includes a mild exfoliator to smooth things down. I'm so happy to see Ulta carrying this, and also glad that the formula didn't change - only the packaging.

rollup.name: Brighten Up 3% TXA Dark Spot Toner
